Can not delete a Customer that still has Appointments open, this method validates that.

After user clicks save on Appointment Page, The start and end times the user entered for that appointment are passed to this method.
checkIfNotWithinAnotherAppointment2(Timestamp, Timestamp, int, int) - Static method in class dataStorage.allAppointments
Method is called after a user clicks save on the "Add/Modify Appointment" page, Verifies that the appointment times the user inputted are not currently at the same time as another Appointment that Customer has scheduled.

After a user clicks save on the Customer or Appointment pages it sends certain TextFields that are supposed to contain phone numbers to this method.

clickedCancelAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.appointment_controller
Close the appointment fxml file and return user to home page without saving any data.
clickedCancelbutton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.delete_confirmation_controller
Close the "delete_error.fxml" file and return user to home page without deleting or removing and data.
clickedCancelCustomerButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.customer_controller
Close the customer fxml file and return user to home page without saving any data.
clickedClear(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.login_controller
Method is ran when user clicks the "Clear" button, it will clear all data inputs, remove all errors displayed to screen, and reset "Show Password" setting to default where password is not invisible.
clickedExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.login_controller
Closes the entire program.
clickedLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.login_controller
Runs the method validate credentials when user clicks "Login".
clickedOkbutton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.delete_confirmation_controller
If user clicks "OK" to confirm deleting a customer or appointment, program will read the title of current FXML file to verify which object to delete.
clickedOkbutton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.notification_error
Closes the pop up if user clicks "OK" button.
clickedSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.appointment_controller
When user clicks the "Save" button in the "Add Appointment" or "Modify Appointment" screen, this method checks that all input fields are valid, that the start time is earlier than the end time, that the appointment time is within business hours and that there are no overlapping appointments.
clickedSaveButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.customer_controller
When the user clicks the save button, program will collect all data in text fields and combo boxes.
closeConnection() - Static method in class Main.JDBC
The closeConnection method closes the database connection.

If page is closed by clicking "X" on top right it will execute this code, which will close the window and return the user to home page without saving any data.

closeWindow() - Method in class controllers.delete_confirmation_controller
When program needs to close page and return to home page without deleting any data it will execute this method which prints messages to the home page notifying the user that no data was deleted.
